# cook your code here
for _ in range(input()):
    n,fff = map(int,raw_input().split())
    s = map(int,raw_input().split())
    if min(s) == 1 or max(s) == n:
        print 'NO'
    else:
        f = True
        s = sorted(s)
        for i in range(len(s)-2):
            if s[i+2]-s[i] == 2:
                f = False
        if f:
            print 'YES'
        else:
            print 'NO'
